byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and AMY CHOZICK

abstract: Campaign Memo; Hillary Clinton's positive policy message is slow to emerge amid parallel effort by campaign to discredit Donald J Trump; strategists suggest Clinton is obligated to take advantage of unique opportunity Trump's incendiary style offers, even at expense of articulating her own vision.
lead_paragraph: Over the summer, Mrs. Clinton focused almost exclusively on discrediting Mr. Trump, but now she has tried to offer a more positive campaign message, even as she continues to denounce him.
snippet: Over the summer, Mrs. Clinton focused almost exclusively on discrediting Mr. Trump, but now she has tried to offer a more positive campaign message, even as she continues to denounce him....

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Positive Message? That Was the Plan, at Least
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Positive Message? That Was the Plan, at Least
